This is the exact error after which it starts failing

CMake Error at c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/pytorch/torch/lib/build/c10d/test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir//./c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o

Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d'

body:
This is the exact error after which it starts failing 
```
CMake Error at c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/pytorch/torch/lib/build/c10d/test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir//./c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o


make[2]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir/c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir/all] Error 2
```

and eventually ends up at

```
make[2]: *** [example/allreduce] Error 1
make[1]: *** [example/CMakeFiles/allreduce.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d'
```
